mapper.select: SELECT * FROM result JOIN user ON result.user_id = user.id WHERE user_id = #{id} ORDER BY time DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO result (user_id, derection, `rank`, time, east_score, south_score, west_score, north_score, east_player, south_player, west_player, north_player) VALUES (#{userId}, #{derection}, #{rank}, NOW(), #{eastScore}, #{southScore}, #{westScore}, #{northScore}, #{eastPlayer}, #{southPlayer}, #{westPlayer}, #{northPlayer})
mapper.update: UPDATE result SET derection = #{derection}, `rank` = #{rank}, east_score = #{eastScore}, south_score = #{southScore}, west_score = #{westScore}, north_score = #{northScore}, east_player = #{eastPlayer}, south_player = #{southPlayer}, west_player = #{westPlayer}, north_player = #{northPlayer} WHERE result_id = #{resultId}
mapper.select: SELECT result.result_id, result.user_id, user.login_id, result.derection, result.rank, result.time, result.east_score, result.south_score, result.west_score, result.north_score, result.east_player, result.south_player, result.west_player, result.north_player FROM result JOIN user ON result.user_id = user.id WHERE result_id = #{resultId}
